Instruction: Wash the radishes and trim off the tops and roots.
Cut the radishes into halves or quarters, depending on their size.
In a bowl, toss the radishes with olive oil, salt, black pepper, and garlic powder until evenly coated.
Spread the radishes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the radishes are tender and slightly browned.
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a delicious side dish.
